name: paralysing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
causing someone to lose the ability to move or feel: Paralysing drugs are administered, along with anaesthesia. It can can lead to the full-blown paralysing disease.
causing a person or group to stop working or acting normally: He suffered a paralysing panic attack recently. This will only prolong a paralysing political crisis that has gripped the country in recent weeks.
More examplesFewer examplesSoon he was aware of the paralysing numbness creeping up his body.The pain was intense and almost paralysing.There is a paralysing fear of a violent reaction by a minority of extremists to any criticism. There were moments of paralysing doubt.
